Columns.Name: CommunicationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a service request/contact Communication.

Columns.Description: The number that identifies the Order Line Item.

Columns.Name: CommunicationReasonNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the communication reason.

Columns.Name: ProgramParticipationStatusId
